## Try R Chapter 3

### Matrices

### Пример
### Matrices
```{r}
matrix(0, 3, 4)

# ---
a <- 1:12
print(a)
matrix(a, 3, 4)

# ---
plank <- 1:8
plank

# ---
dim(plank) <- c(2, 4)
print(plank)

# ---
matrix(1,5,5)
```

### Пример
### Matrix Access
```{r}
print(plank)
plank[2, 3]
plank[1,4]
plank[1, 4] <- 0
plank[2,]
plank[, 4]
plank[, 2:4]
```

### Пример
### Matrix Plotting
```{r}
elevation <- matrix(1, 10, 10)
elevation[4, 6] <- 0
elevation
contour(elevation)
persp(elevation)
persp(elevation, expand=0.2)
# ---
contour(volcano)
persp(volcano, expand=0.2)
# ---
image(volcano)
```
